contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox album <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = Os Últimos Heróis | Type = Studio | Artist = [[Menudo (band)|Menudo]] | Cover = Os Ultimos Herois.jpg | Label = [[RCA Victor]] | Released = 1990 | Recorded = 1989–1990 | Genre = [[Pop music|Pop]], [[Rock music|rock]] | Length = 33 min. and 22 sec. | Language = [[Portuguese language|Portuguese]] | Producer = | Reviews = | Last album = ''[[Los últimos héroes|Los Últimos Héroes]]''<br>1989 | This album = ''Os Últimos Heróis''<br>1990 | Next album = ''[[No Me Corten El Pelo]]''<br>1990 }} '''''Os Últimos Heróis.''''' ([[1990 in music|1990]]) is [[Menudo (band)|Menudo]]'s 29th album (fourth in Portuguese). It features '''[[Sergio Blass]]''', '''[[Ruben Gomez (singer)|Ruben Gómez]]''', '''[[Robert Avellanet]]''', '''[[Rawy Torres]]''', and new member '''[[César Abreu]]'''. Cesar replaced [[Angelo García]] after Angelo quit the band making him the 5th member to do so. In Angelo's case he still had a long time left to go before he had to leave the group. That is not all. César Abreu also quit the band after only about seven months of becoming a member. Management filled the spot left by César with the first non Puerto Rican member, '''[[Adrián Olivares]]''' of [[Mexico]]. Management re-recorded a few songs with Adrián as the lead vocal and re-released this same album with a new cover. The second release had an additional song. The songs on this album are from various of the band's previous Spanish albums translated into Portuguese. ==First release with César== # Quando For Grande # Minha Lua, Minha Luz # Giro, Rodo # Agora-Eu-Sei # Os Ultimos Herois # Minha Sombra Na Parede # A Primeira Vez # Estamos Em Acao # Doces Dezesseis # A Forca Do Rock ==Second release with Adrián== # Quando For Grande # Minha Lua, Minha Luz # Rodo Giro # Agora Eu Sei # Os Ultimos Herois # Minha Sobre Na Parede # A Primeira Vez # Estamos Em Acao # Doces Dezesseis # A Forca Do Rock # Serenata Rock And Roll [[Category:1990 albums]] [[Category:Menudo albums]] {{Latin-album-stub}}
